languages.text: {n}Что бы ни говорила Кибелла, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}ваши чувства{/d} говорят иное. Тонкая нить психической связи протянулась между вашими разумами. Слишком тонкая, чтобы смотреть и чувствовать через нее, но... Слишком прочная, чтобы быть чем-то незначимым.{/n}

{n}Kibellah can call it what she wants, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your senses{/d} tell a different story. A fine thread of psychic connection has stretched between your minds. It is too weak to let you see or feel through another's consciousness, and yet... it is too strong to be dismissed as insignificant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah kann es nennen, wie sie will, aber {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}deine Sinne{/d} sagen dir etwas anderes. Der feine Faden einer psionischen Verbindung hat sich zwischen euch gebildet. Die Verbindung ist zu schwach, um mit dem Bewusstsein des anderen zu sehen oder zu fühlen, gleichzeitig aber zu stark, um sie als unbedeutend zu ignorieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah can call it what she wants, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your senses{/d} tell a different story. A fine thread of psychic connection has stretched between your minds. It is too weak to let you see or feel through another's consciousness, and yet... it is too strong to be dismissed as insignificant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah kann es nennen, wie sie will, aber {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}deine Sinne{/d} sagen dir etwas anderes. Der feine Faden einer psionischen Verbindung hat sich zwischen euch gebildet. Die Verbindung ist zu schwach, um mit dem Bewusstsein des anderen zu sehen oder zu fühlen, gleichzeitig aber zu stark, um sie als unbedeutend zu ignorieren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah peut bien dire ce qu'elle veut, vos {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sens{/d} vous racontent une tout autre histoire. Entre vos esprits s'est créé un lien psychique qui, bien que ténu, vous permet de voir et de ressentir à travers la conscience de l'autre... Pourtant, il est trop fort pour être insignifiant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah can call it what she wants, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your senses{/d} tell a different story. A fine thread of psychic connection has stretched between your minds. It is too weak to let you see or feel through another's consciousness, and yet... it is too strong to be dismissed as insignificant.{/n}

Entre vos esprits s'est créé un lien psychique qui, bien que ténu, vous permet de voir et de ressentir à travers la conscience de l'autre... Pourtant, il est trop fort pour être insignifiant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah lo llamará como quiera, pero {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}tus sentidos{/d} dicen otra cosa. El fino hilo de una conexión psíquica ha unido vuestras mentes. Es demasiado débil para permitirte ver o sentir la consciencia ajena... pero demasiado fuerte como para descartarlo por insignificante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah can call it what she wants, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your senses{/d} tell a different story. A fine thread of psychic connection has stretched between your minds. Es demasiado débil para permitirte ver o sentir la consciencia ajena... pero demasiado fuerte como para descartarlo por insignificante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}キベラは、それを好きに呼べばいい。けれど{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}あなたの感覚{/d}は、そうではないと訴えている。あなたたちの心は、精神的に二人をつなぐ細い糸で結ばれている。他人の意識を通じて見たり感じたりするには弱すぎるが、それでも…取るに足らない者だとみなすには強すぎる結びつきだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah can call it what she wants, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your senses{/d} tell a different story. A fine thread of psychic connection has stretched between your minds. It is too weak to let you see or feel through another's consciousness, and yet... it is too strong to be dismissed as insignificant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは、それを好きに呼べばいい。けれど{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}あなたの感覚{/d}は、そうではないと訴えている。あなたたちの心は、精神的に二人をつなぐ細い糸で結ばれている。他人の意識を通じて見たり感じたりするには弱すぎるが、それでも…取るに足らない者だとみなすには強すぎる結びつきだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}虽然绮贝菈并不承认，但通过{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}你的感官{/d}，你看到的真相却并非如此。你看到一条灵能的细线在你们的意识之中不断伸展，它过于微小，根本无法通过他人的意识看到或感受到，然而……它又是那么柔韧，无法简简单单地忽略。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah can call it what she wants, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your senses{/d} tell a different story. A fine thread of psychic connection has stretched between your minds. It is too weak to let you see or feel through another's consciousness, and yet... it is too strong to be dismissed as insignificant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}虽然绮贝菈并不承认，但通过{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}你的感官{/d}，你看到的真相却并非如此。你看到一条灵能的细线在你们的意识之中不断伸展，它过于微小，根本无法通过他人的意识看到或感受到，然而……它又是那么柔韧，无法简简单单地忽略。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah bunu istediği gibi adlandırırken {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}hislerinse{/d} sana farklı bir hikâye anlatıyor. Zihinleriniz arasında ruhsezi bağlantısı taşıyan, sağlam bir iplik uzanıyor. Başka birinin bilincinde olan bitenleri görmeni veya hissetmeni sağlayacak kadar güçlü olmasa da... Önemsizmiş gibi bir köşeye atılamayacak bir iplik bu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah can call it what she wants, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your senses{/d} tell a different story. A fine thread of psychic connection has stretched between your minds. It is too weak to let you see or feel through another's consciousness, and yet... it is too strong to be dismissed as insignificant.{/n}
